title: Pls help ! something problem when i start a game
body:
hi riot . pls help me . sometime i choose champions and go to start game . and i disconect and can put logo " Play " cause like this and when they repair done and i try to start again my team all remake . 
http://imgur.com/a/XitFS
I DONT WANT TO GET LEAVERBUSTER BECAUSE THAT NOT MY FAULT . PLEASE HELP ME 

im so sorry because my english so bad . Thanks You Riot Help Me . I THINK THAT A BUG

replies.body: It seems like there may have been a bad game file or install that caused your game to crash, so the updated client is running repairs for you.  You'd only get a [leaverbuster](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ) after multiple leaves and not just 1 game, so I wouldn't worry if this was a one-off.  Let me know if you have any questions!
